productsFromInvoice.gqlQuery: query GetProductsByInvoice($invoice: String!) { mo_retur_receive(where: {invoice: {_eq: $invoice}}) { invoice_retur_to_invoice { sku_toko product_name part_pk quantity_convert } } }

graph.gqlQuery: query MyQuery($proc_inst_id: [String!]) { mo_retur_receive(where: {proc_inst_id: {_in: $proc_inst_id}}) { proc_inst_id resi_retur invoice retur_date courier courier_name invoice_retur_to_invoice { sku_toko product_name part_pk quantity_convert } } }
